column5: I was at the Port Perry launch this past weekend and the docks were not in yet.  Any word on when they plan on doing so?  I may hit that area this weekend at some point.  Thanks!
I think the best thing to do is give them a call and find out. West Shore Marine 2175 Whitfield Road  Phone: 905-985-2658  Hope that helps
Cool...thanks for the number!  I'll give them a call and find out for sure before I head out there.

i was there a few weeks ago just to burn the cobwebs out uf the motor there was no dock in portperry.but the launch is paved and it was easy enough to launch without one.but that was about 3 weeks ago they may have it in now.
I was there on Tuesday morning, no docks yet. On parking lot was a van with "FISH TV" logo with nice nitro trailer.
